[Page Title: View the Chick-fil-A Menu for Pickup or Delivery | Chick-fil-A]

Skip to content Language: English Español 
Menu
Chick-fil-A ® 
Price and availability may vary by location.
Breakfast 
Chicken for breakfast? Yes, please. If you’ve only visited us for lunch or dinner, you’re missing our Hashbrowns, Burritos, Berry Parfait and more.
View all breakfast items Chick-n-Minis Chick-fil-A ® Order now Spicy Chicken Biscuit Order now Entrées 
From our Original Chick-fil-AChicken Sandwich to our new Frosted Sodas and Floats, we have something for everyone.
® View all entrées Chicken Sandwich Chick-fil-A ® Order now Nuggets Chick-fil-A ® Order now 
Salads

Go green with these options, prepared fresh daily, and perk them up with our variety of dressings.
View all salads 
Sides

An entrée without a side is like a day without sunshine. Whether you choose an old favorite like Waffle Fries or mix it up with something new like Mac & Cheese, make it a meal by adding a side.
View all sides Entrées 
From our Original Chick-fil-AChicken Sandwich to our new Frosted Sodas and Floats, we have something for everyone.
® View all entrées Chicken Sandwich Chick-fil-A ® Order now 8 ct Nuggets Chick-fil-A ® Order now Breakfast 
Chicken for breakfast? Yes, please. If you’ve only visited us for lunch or dinner, you’re missing our Hashbrowns, Burritos, Berry Parfait and more.
View all breakfast items Chick-n-Minis Chick-fil-A ® Order now Spicy Chicken Biscuit Order now 
Kid’s Meals

From Grilled Nuggets to Fruit Cups, we have several options for our youngest guests.
View all Kid’s Meals 
Beverages

Satisfy your thirst with a Sunjoy, Lemonade, Iced Tea and more.
® View all beverages 
Treats

You deserve a little something sweet. How does a Frosted Soda, Chocolate Chunk Cookie or Fudge Brownie sound?
View all treats 
Catering

Make any occasion special by ordering a catered feast. From Nugget Trays to boxed meals, we handle the prep so you can enjoy the party.
Chick-fil-A ® View catering menu

200 Cal per Entree
Order now 5 Ct Grilled Nuggets Kid’s Meal 
80 Cal per Entree
Order now 
What's next

Explore treats
View treats Ages 4 and up 
™
Legends of Evergreen Hills 
Celebrate the magic of the holiday season with four different interactive card games inspired by the Evergreen Hills universe. Test your memory with a fun matching game, enjoy a twist on Old Maid, trade and collect your favorite apprentices and characters, and dive into an immersive adventure where you help restore the sparks of Evergreen. These games are perfect for fun with friends and family! Collect all four titles: , ,, and
Memory Quest My Apprentice Save the Spark Spark Tree. 
Available from participating restaurant locations, while supplies last.
Ages 3 and under 
You’re My Little

Celebrate the special bond between parent and child with these sweet and colorful rhyming board books. Part of a best-selling series, they feature adorable pictures and simple ideas that help little ones learn about love and sharing joy together. Perfect for early childhood fun! Collect all four titles: You’re My Little Bookworm, You’re My Little Honey Bunny, You’re My Little Snuggle Bear, and You’re My Little Sunshine. Available from participating restaurant locations, while supplies last.

Discover the Chick-fil-A  Play™ App

The Chick-fil-A Play App is your home for free, family-friendly shows, games and activities designed to create more time with your favorite people. Make meaningful moments together while you watch, play, create, listen, and read.
Learn more about Chick-fil-A Play
